sectionDescription: Properties applied to XSD Complex Types

fields.description: The DataClass to used as a 'base type' with the derivation method of 'extension' for this complex type
The DataClass to used as a 'base type' with the derivation method of 'restriction' for this complex type
Is the DataClass an abstract Complex Type

sectionDescription: Properties which are applied defining the schema for the element

fields.description: The target namespace for the Element in the XSD if different from the namespace defined at the schema level.
The optional prefix used to define the target namespace.
